mapper.select:
select count(*) from news as n left join user as u on n.create_user = u.id where n.status="1"
and n.module_id = #{moduleId}
and( n.news_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{newsTitle},'%')
or n.news_label LIKE CONCAT('%',#{newsLabel},'%')
or u.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{createUserName},'%'))

select n.id as id, n.module_id as moduleId, m.module_name as moduleName, n.news_title as newsTitle, n.news_content as newsContent, n.news_label as newsLabel, n.news_address as newsAddress, n.create_time as createTime, n.create_user as createUser, n.update_time as updateTime, n.update_user as updateUser, n.status as status, u.user_name as createUserName from news as n left join user as u on n.create_user = u.id left join module as m on n.module_id=m.id where n.status="1" and n.id = #{newsId}
